cheatsheet.title: Create a diagram for the DSL

intro.description:
This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to create a diagram for a DSL.
To learn more about using cheat sheets, click the help button in the top right corner (?).

item.title: Create diagram definition
item.description:
To create a new diagram definition, navigate to File->New...->Domain-Specific Language->Diagram Definition->Graphical Model.
Alternatively, click the following button to perform the task.

item.title: Create tooling definition
item.description:
